name: Upon The White Mountain
description:
In this incredibly relaxing (and stressful) adventure you'll be on a mission to dodge trees and collect coins in the standard mode or pass through the flags that appear in your path in slalom mode.

In Upon The White Mountain you must try to achieve the highest possible score to beat the other players on the leaderboard. There are two leaderboards, the standard leaderboard, where you earn points based on the distance you have travelled, and the slalom leaderboard, where you earn points by passing through the flags that appear in your path.


Upon The White Mountain is a ski and snowboard game in which you can customize your appearance in the game's store. Coins used in the store can be obtained for free by skiing down the mountain or watching videos.
